body:
@SteveL-MSFT, your last commit had 5 failures in `PowerShell-CI-windows`
Hard link and symbolic link tests.New-Item and hard/symbolic links.New-Item can create a directory symbolic link to a directory
```powershell
Expected exactly 'C:\Users\VSSADM~1\AppData\Local\Temp\37d1d669-4947-4252-a613-22b9c2555e0c\subdir', but got C.
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Management\FileSystem.Tests.ps1: line 483
483:             $link.Target[0] | Should -BeExactly $real.ToString()
```
Dot-source operator is not allowed in modules on locked down systems that export functions with wildcards.Verifies that a classes only module with dot-source and with using directive loads successfully
```powershell
The term 'PublicUsingFn' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program.
Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again.
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Security\ConstrainedLanguageModules.Tests.ps1: line 426
426:                 $result = PublicUsingFn

```
Import trusted manifest files in system lockdown mode.Verifies that trusted manifest with nested modules and no extension module exports explicit function
```powershell
Cannot load the module 'C:\Users\VSSADM~1\AppData\Local\Temp\77719d4f-49c7-4125-babe-ddc18dee6866\ImportTrustedManifestWithNestedModsAndNoExtNoFnExport_System32' because the module nesting limit has been exceeded. Modules can only be nested to 10 levels. Evaluate and change the order in which you are loading modules to prevent exceeding the nesting limit, and then try running your script again.
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Security\ConstrainedLanguageModules.Tests.ps1: line 1214
1214:                 $module = Import-Module -Name $manifestFileName -Force -PassThru

```
PowerShellGet - Module tests (Admin).Error occurred in Describe block
```powershell
Exception calling "ShouldContinue" with "2" argument(s): "Object reference not set to an instance of an object."
At D:\a\1\s\src\powershell-win-core\bin\release\netcoreapp3.0\win7-x64\publish\Modules\PowerShellGet\PSModule.psm1:11044 char:9
```
PowerShellGet - Script tests (Admin).Error occurred in Describe block
```powershell
Exception calling "ShouldContinue" with "2" argument(s): "Object reference not set to an instance of an object."
At D:\a\1\s\src\powershell-win-core\bin\release\netcoreapp3.0\win7-x64\publish\Modules\PowerShellGet\PSModule.psm1:11044 char:9
```

@SteveL-MSFT, your last commit had 4 failures in `PowerShell-CI-macos`
Send-MailMessage.Error occurred in Describe block
```powershell
Cannot bind argument to parameter 'Path' because it is null.
At /Users/vsts/agent/2.150.0/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Send-MailMessage.Tests.ps1:11 char:30
```
Measure-Object.Numeric tests.Should be able to return all the statitics for given values
```powershell
Expected strings to be the same, but they were different.
Expected length: 16
Actual length:   18
Strings differ at index 16.
Expected: '3.02765035409749'
But was:  '3.0276503540974917'
---------------------------^
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.150.0/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Measure-Object.Tests.ps1: line 185
185:             ($result.StandardDeviation).ToString()  | Should -Be '3.02765035409749'
```
Validate Json serialization.Validate Json serialization for types.Validate '[single]::MaxValue | ConvertTo-Json' and '[single]::MaxValue | ConvertTo-Json | ConvertFrom-Json'
```powershell
Expected strings to be the same, but they were different.
Expected length: 14
Actual length:   13
Strings differ at index 8.
Expected: '3.40282347E+38'
But was:  '3.4028235E+38'
-------------------^
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.150.0/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Pester.Commands.Cmdlets.Json.Tests.ps1: line 1252
1252:                 $result.ToJson | Should -Be $testCase.ToJson
```
Validate Json serialization.Validate Json serialization for types.Validate '[single]::MinValue | ConvertTo-Json' and '[single]::MinValue | ConvertTo-Json | ConvertFrom-Json'
```powershell
Expected strings to be the same, but they were different.
Expected length: 15
Actual length:   14
Strings differ at index 9.
Expected: '-3.40282347E+38'
But was:  '-3.4028235E+38'
--------------------^
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.150.0/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Pester.Commands.Cmdlets.Json.Tests.ps1: line 1252
1252:                 $result.ToJson | Should -Be $testCase.ToJson
```


```powershell
Expected strings to be the same, but they were different.
Expected length: 15

Strings differ at index 9.
Expected: '-3.40282347E+38'
But was:  '-3.4028235E+38'
--------------------^
at <ScriptBlock>, /home/vsts/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Pester.Commands.Cmdlets.Json.Tests.ps1: line 1252
1252:                 $result.ToJson | Should -Be $testCase.ToJson
```
